casebody.data:
COUNTY OF DURHAM
v.
BURNETTE 404A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Mary McCullers Reece, Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Burnette, Robert. Geri Ruzage, Senior Assistant County Attorney, for County of Durham, by and through Durham DSS, ex rel: Sharon L. Wilson and Tiffany A. King.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of February 2019 by Plaintiff for Permission to Provide Supplemental Authority:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
